testcase.name: Summer Dress Selection
testcase.system-out: Given user launches application.............................................passed When user clicks sign in button.............................................passed And user enters valid email and password....................................passed And user clicks submit button...............................................passed And user moves cursor to DRESSES bar........................................passed And user clicks SUMMER DRESSES..............................................passed And user selects "Printed Summer Dress".....................................passed And user selects 2 dresses and "S" size and "blue"..........................passed And user adds into card.....................................................passed Then user closes the application............................................passed
